name: Geeta S. Iyengar
quote: “Knowledge has a beginning but no end.”

name: L. Frank Baum
quote: “No thief, however skillful, can rob one of knowledge, and that is why knowledge is the best and safest treasure to acquire.”

name: Alan Moore
quote: “Knowledge, like air, is vital to life. Like air, no one should be denied it.”

name: Thomas H. Huxley
quote: “Every great advance in natural knowledge has involved the absolute rejection of authority.”

name: Arthur C. Aufderheide
quote: “All knowledge is connected to all other knowledge. The fun is in making the connections.”
